title: Concurrent Systems
description: Models of concurrency: process algebras, Petri nets, temporal logics and model checking; concurrency as software structuring principle: processes, threads, synchronization mechanisms, resource management and sharing; deadlock, safety and liveness; design, verification and testing of concurrent systems.
schedule: Three lectures, one tutorial (two hours); second term; may be offered also in the first term
courseText: Models of concurrency: process algebras, Petri nets, temporal logics and model checking; concurrency as software structuring principle: processes, threads, synchronization mechanisms, resource management and sharing; deadlock, safety and liveness; design, verification and testing of concurrent systems.
Three lectures, one tutorial (two hours); second term; may be offered also in the first term
